name: crudkit-example-orders
title: CRUDKit Order Management Example
description: Complete working example of order management system with CRUDKit. Includes order schema with order number, customer details, email, total amount, status workflow, order date, and items list. Features 10+ mock orders demonstrating various order statuses (pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled). Shows filtering by status, sorting by date/amount, date range capabilities, and order lifecycle management. Perfect for building e-commerce order management, fulfillment systems, and customer order tracking interfaces.
